fact_check_explanation_title: We don’t yet know if anti-malaria drug chloroquine is a cure for Covid-19
fact_check_explanation_summary: People have been claiming that the drug, and a similar one hydroxychloroquine cures the virus. We don’t know if that’s true yet.

fact_check_explanation_title: Viral list of UK lockdown rules is not right
fact_check_explanation_summary: A list of rules for the UK Covid-19 lockdown has been widely shared on Facebook, but is not accurate.

fact_check_explanation_title: Anyone can make an Extinction Rebellion sticker
fact_check_explanation_summary: There have been numerous instances of the Extinction Rebellion logo being used to mock the group or distort its message.

fact_check_explanation_title: US scientists have not created a vaccine for the new coronavirus
fact_check_explanation_summary: Many scientists are working on a vaccine to prevent the spread of the new coronavirus, but it will likely be 18 months before it is available for public use.

fact_check_explanation_title: This text message is not an official government communication
fact_check_explanation_summary: While people have received a genuine text from the government about the new coronavirus lockdown rules, one about monitoring their movement is fake.

fact_check_explanation_title: How you can fact check claims about Covid-19
fact_check_explanation_summary: There’s a lot of misinformation about Covid-19, so Full Fact is sharing its top tips on how to check if a claim is true.

fact_check_explanation_title: Xbox and PlayStation servers are not being shut down during school hours
fact_check_explanation_summary: This is not a real news story.

fact_check_explanation_title: These numbers about Covid-19 deaths in the UK and Italy are broadly accurate
fact_check_explanation_summary: Not enough is known about the new coronavirus to say that the number of deaths in the UK will grow at the same rates as Italy.

fact_check_explanation_title: There’s still no evidence that you can catch the new coronavirus from your pet
fact_check_explanation_summary: Hundreds of thousands have shared claims on Facebook that pets don’t carry the virus.

fact_check_explanation_title: A government report didn’t say the countryside was “too white”
fact_check_explanation_summary: The government did publish a report about national parks, and parts of it discuss how to encourage black, Asian and minority ethnic people to visit these areas.

fact_check_explanation_title: Vladimir Putin did not say that all Russian people should stay at home or face five years in jail
fact_check_explanation_summary: Russia currently has no nationwide restrictions of this kind.

fact_check_explanation_title: Russia has not unleashed 500 lions to stop people going outdoors
fact_check_explanation_summary: This is a fake story that uses a picture of a lion in South Africa from 2016.
